CV Travel Prep.title: CV maintenance checklist
CV Travel Prep.description: Go through the CV Maintenance checklist

CV Travel Prep.title: Stock up on personal supplies
CV Travel Prep.description: Make sure you are stocked up on ammo, bandages, food, drill & MT charges supplies.

CV Maintenance.title: Check fuel
CV Maintenance.description: Check fuel levels and refill if needed.

CV Maintenance.title: Check oxygen
CV Maintenance.description: Check oxygen levels and refill if needed.

CV Maintenance.title: Check warp drive tank
CV Maintenance.description: Verify that warp drive tank has enough pentaxit.

CV Maintenance.title: Check food supply
CV Maintenance.description: Verify that the fridge contains enough food for the duration of the trip.

CV Maintenance.title: Check constructor supplies
CV Maintenance.description: Restock constructor with ingots and materials, if necessary and possible
